General.Name: Search Minerals Inc
General.Description: Search Minerals Inc. engages in the acquisition, evaluation, and exploration of mineral resource properties in Canada. It explores for rare earth elements, zirconium, and hafnium deposits. The company's flagship project is the 100% owned Deep Fox and Foxtrot project located in the Port of St. Lewis, Labrador. Search Minerals Inc. was incorporated in 2006 and is headquartered in North Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 901 West 3rd Street, North Vancouver, BC, Canada, V7P 3P9
